lead_paragraph: The Knicks picked up one-year options on David Lee, Nate Robinson, Mardy Collins and Renaldo Balkman, ensuring that the core of their bench will remain intact through 2009. Lee and Robinson, first-round picks in 2005, had their fourth-year options picked up, making them eligible for contract extensions next summer. Collins and Balkman, first-round picks in 2006, had their third-year options picked up.
